text:
jcovmerge only works if the subdirectory "Coverage" of the "JProbe"-directory 
is used as home path, all other jprobe-tasks use the "JProbe"-directory as home.
creator: s.hardege@web.de

text:
Fixed in CVS or wait for the next nightly build.
Thanks for reporting the bug.
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
